channel.title: Help! :o
channel.description: I need some help through teamviewer, or someone who is really good at explaining things. I want to know how to change how everyone who logs on is an admin, how to place objects such as altars, and how to edit shops. Thanks in advance! :D

item.title: Help! :o
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“RsMakerWoad, post:2, topic:458652”]I strongly recommend not doing the admin thing people will be banning each other and iping each other advertises would ip all servER
NOT GOOD IDEA[/quote]
^ And This Is The Wrong Section, This is for CLIENT help not server, go to SERVER help for more answers. Make People Mod Instead. Make Mod have No Powers, And I Could Help You Develop this, Pm me if you want to. GL
